entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain and a few flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and a few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 50 late this evening then west 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
